title: Prevention of SQL Injection on Website
description: This project is based on the Cyber Security domain.Main focus is to provide the prevention and detection mechanism to secure the data from one of the cyber attacks ie.SQL Injection Attack

title: Encrypt/Decrypt message using Plairfair & Caesar Cipher
description: This project is focuses on cybersecurity, encrypting/decrypting messages with Playfair Caesar Cipher, and ensuring secure message transfer with secret keys.

title: Employees Management System By Using React.Js
description: This project built to manages the task between the employees and admin.For building this project we use React.JS with taliwind CSS for styling.All data are stored on Local Storage.

title: React-ShoppingCart_Ecommerce_Website
description: This is React E-commerce shopping cart app with search,filter,addtocart,realted product functionality.

title: React API Project
description: This project is focuses fetching data from third party through API and show the data on webpage
